name: Iphone 12 Pro
description: The iPhone 12 Pro is a truly excellent phone, at a luxury price.

name: Iphone 13 Pro
description: The iPhone 13 Pro is the one of the most powerful phones ever.

name: Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: The Galaxy S23 Ultra is a lot, but in a good way.

name: Galaxy S22 Ultra
description: The S22 Ultra throttled faster and harder under heavy use than the S21 Ultra.

name: Galaxy ZFold 4
description: It's hard to imagine a phone getting much better than this.

name: Macbook Pro
description: The MacBook Pro is a very capable gaming laptop.

name: Macbook Air
description: But the MacBook Air does all that and more, in a lighter and less costly package.

name: Zenbook Pro
description: The Asus ZenBook Pro 16X OLED is a top-notch creative laptop.

name: Asus Rog
description: The Zenbook 14 is the best laptop you can get for the price.

name: JBL Charge
description: On Apple's '60s Rock Essentials playlist, the Charge 5 consistently impresses.

name: JBL Partybox
description: The JBL PartyBox 300 is a Bluetooth speaker for loud parties.

name: JBL flip
description: If you want a solid party or adventure speaker, Flip 6 is a great option.
